title: The Decline of Grammar - passage as a whole

content.prompt: Taken as a whole, the passage is best described as a

choices.label: critique of the characteristics of bureaucratic prose
technical analysis of a point of linguistic theory
discussion of differing attitudes toward linguistic change
description that relies primarily on concrete examples

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
